::Shredder::

Shredder nods. "I'll ask Magmatron about that."

Shredder opens a comm to Magmatron. "Magmatron, me and the others 
here arn't pleased with how Cerberus treated his team. If we can get 
the garauntee that we will be treated as well as the others, we'll 
continue to be Destrons. If not, we won't."



--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, Alloran2@a... wrote:
> Ramjet: Well, personally, i dont know what i think.  I've been a 
loyal 
> Destron for a long time.  Me and my team served under Magmatron, 
then 
> Bobertron, and now you.  i cant picture myself not being a 
Destron.  But on 
> the other hand, that Cerberus guy basically denounced the fact that 
we are 
> Destrons.  I will only continue if Magmatron insures us that our 
lives are 
> not in danger and that we will be considered as much Destrons as 
his other 
> troops are.
> ::The others agree and wait for Shredders responce::
